With great access point to many popular areas in Colombo, this beautiful home is perfect for those looking for a sense of convenience. At 3 stories tall, this newly constructed house has a unique sense of style and architecture, there is plenty of space for any family with 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 stylish bathrooms, a front garden, maids and driver’s quarters, two rooftop terraces as well as private balconies. Other luxury features include hot water, air conditioning, CCTV home security system and an office space. This house is a perfect example of a more refreshing approach to Sri Lankan architecture including principles of ventilation and interior illumination by natural light.

As mentioned, there are very convenient routes within the Madiwela area to places such Mirihana, Maharagama, Nugegoda, Kotte and Pellawatte, this also means that banks, hospitals, school, supermarkets and restaurants are abundant in the area since it is in a central location.
